PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Act One - 15 points Quest: The Marooned Mariner -The Dweller of the Deep - The Way Forward Trial: The Lower Prison
Act Two - 27 points Quest: Deal with the Bandits (for +2 points) Trial: The Crypt Level 1, The Chamber of Sins Level 2
Act Three - 41 points Quest: Victario's Secrets - Piety's Pets Trial: The Crematorium, The Catacombs, The Imperial Gardens Level 33 Normal Labyrinth
Act Four - 47 points Quest: An Indomitable Spirit
Act Five - 53 points Quest: In Service to Science - Kitava's Torments
Act Six - 61 points Quest: The Father of War - The Puppet Mistress - The Cloven One Trial: The Prison
Act Seven - 69 points Quest: The Master of a Million Faces - Kishara's Star - Queen of Despair Trial: The Crypt, The Chamber of Sins Level 2 Level 55 Cruel Labyrinth
Act Eight - 77 points Quest: Reflection of Terror - Love is Dead Trial: The Bath House
Act Nine - 83 points Quest: The Ruler of Highgate - Queen of the Sands Trial: The Tunnel
Act Ten - 92 points Quest: An End to Hunger - Vilenta's Vengeance Trial: The Ossuary Level 68 Merciless labyrinth
Early Game | level 84 - 104 points Level 75 The Eternal labyrinth Trial of Piercing Truth, Trial of Swirling Fear, Trial of Crippling Grief, Trial of Burning Rage, Trial of Lingering Pain, Trial of Stinging Doubt
